participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and playful, loves adventure and fairy tales.
participant_1.background: My mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside. My daddy brings home flowers for me. I'm a four year old girl with brown eyes and hair. I like playing outside in the sun with my dolls. I sleep in a princess bed.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and enthusiastic about technology, loves exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: I just graduated from high school. I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz where I was accepted. I will study computer science. I like playing games online. I'm a vegetarian.

content.text: Hi! I'm a 4-year-old girl named participant_1.
Hi participant_2, I'm participant_2. I just graduated from high school and I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz to study computer science.
That's cool! What do you want to do with computer science?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to find out.
I bet you'll do great!
Thanks!
What are your favorite games to play online?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite right now is Fortnite.
I've heard of that! It looks like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a battle royale game where you're dropped into an island with 100 other players and you have to be the last one standing.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What do you like to do for fun outside of gaming?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to read and watch movies.
I like those things too! I love to go hiking in the mountains.
Me too! It's so beautiful up there.
I love the fresh air and the views.
Me too!
It's been nice talking to you!
You too!
I hope you have a great time at UC Santa Cruz!
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
